document_data.name: ''Ice Bullet''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Ice bullets''''' were enchanted variety of [[sling]] [[bullet]]s that were carved from the bodies of [[ice para-elemental]]s.
document_data.Powers: When launched at the enemies, ''ice bullets'' gave off a blast of freeing cold upon impact. Their power allowed these bullets to flash-freeze armor and flesh alike.
document_data.History: In the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], many enchanted sling bullets were a common sight along the [[Sword Coast]], the [[Moonsea]], and used by numerous individuals and factions.
document_data.Notable Users: *Jarl [[Bashnagg]]: the leader of the nomadic [[frost giant]] [[Bloodaxe (tribe)|Bloodaxe]] tribe that dwelt in a cave between [[Voonlar]] and [[YÃ»lash]] ''circa'' [[1373 DR]].
